title: Good food and nice interior
text: The decoration of the restaurant is very nice and it sells as well products in his shop. I was there twice during my holiday and the food was always very tasty, especially the pasta with Shrimp, but also the cheese and sausage dish.

title: Beautiful area
text: Plaka is a beautiful area in Athen with small shops - also open on Sunday, nice streets, lots of restaurants, good to relax, nice views to the sites. Get off the sightseeing bus at stop Monastiraki Square.

title: Site with great view
text: The view is nice and if you are in Athen it is a must-see. Now, in this Corona time, there were a good amount of visitors therefore you always had enough space and time to take photos. Unfortunately, the north slope was closed and there was some renovation work.

title: Great location, atmosphere and very friendly staff
text: The location is great up the hill under trees. It is nicely decorated with lamps in the trees and on the tables. From every table you can have a nice view. The food is delicious and the staff gives good recommendations. They are very friendly to everyone - families, couples, friends, and solo travelers.
